content.raw: Hi @timn, thanks for the PR. Could you elaborate a bit more on what the use case may be? Maybe adding a simple test?
content.html: Hi @timn, thanks for the PR. Could you elaborate a bit more on what the use case may be? Maybe adding a simple test?

There hasn't been a reply in almost 2 years. We're migrating this repository to GitHub, so I'm going to decline this. I can't pull the changes into our repository because they were done on the default branch, but for future reference, here's the diff:

diff -r 4b4191169c2c -r e794f85dee19 gz3d/src/gziface.js
--- a/gz3d/src/gziface.js       Fri Mar 22 21:52:12 2019 +0000
+++ b/gz3d/src/gziface.js       Tue Jun 19 11:24:44 2018 +0200
@@ -301,12 +298,13 @@

   var visualUpdate = function(message)
   {
-    if (!this.scene.getByName(message.name))
+    var obj = this.scene.getByName(message.name);
+    if (!obj)
     {
       // accept only collision visual msgs for now
       if (message.name.indexOf('COLLISION_VISUAL') < 0)
       {
-        return;
+        //return;
       }

       // delay the add if parent not found, this array will checked in
@@ -322,6 +320,12 @@
         parent.add(visualObj);
       }
     }
+    else
+    {
+      var obj = this.scene.getByName(message.name);
+      this.scene.setPose(obj, message.pose.position, message.pose.orientation);
+      obj.matrixWorldNeedsUpdate = true;
+    }
   };

   visualTopic.subscribe(visualUpdate.bind(this));

content.raw: do you need to get `obj` again?
